title: Miser's Purse, 1815–40
medium:
Medium: silk, metal beads
Technique: metal beads sewn to white silk machine-made net using running stitch.
description: Netted white silk ornamented with cut steel beads in small star and anchor motifs and a larger triple zigzag pattern. Two faceted steel rings control side closing; small cut steel drops at each end.

tombstone.epitaph:
Miser's Purse, 1815–40.
1815–40. Medium: silk, metal beads
Technique: metal beads sewn to white silk machine-made net using running stitch.. Gift of Mrs. Albert Blum. 1953-106-100.
